channel.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
channel.description:
Escalation map pack: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U_Wz3CWYStU&feature=relmfu
Call of Dead(zombies): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_Cx82OFXM0&feature=topvideos_gadgets
I like zombies, but black ops is boring as hell.

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:21, topic:392993”]Shit just like the last map pack and Black ops in general.[/quote]naw, the maps are actually pretty decent.

black ops is just boring now, the game itself isn’t too terrible.

Read full topic

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:15, topic:392993”]I’m going to add. If you have an xbox 360 (which you should), you can buy a cheap flash drive for 5-10 dollars, and put ascension, and the new zombie maps on a “new” account, and it downloads basically on your account…

Look it up for more info on google.[/quote]
Yeah, I have a 8 GB Flash Drive along with a 13 GB hard-drive, it works out fine.

OT: I just think if the snipers are almost like MW2 what is the reason for holding back on removing the whole damn thing.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I’m going to add. If you have an xbox 360 (which you should), you can buy a cheap flash drive for 5-10 dollars, and put ascension, and the new zombie maps on a “new” account, and it downloads basically on your account…

Look it up for more info on google.

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The only reason I would buy this is for the zombies, apart from that it is bad company 2 all the way for me. But I suppose the wager matches can be quite entertaining.

Read full topic
item.source: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I only enjoy quickscoping when it’s in a private match and everyone is doing it for fun, not when tryhards are trying to make a montage and go 5-28.

I’d rather play a game with sniping like Bad Company 2. Much more enjoyable because it actually takes more ‘talent’. Sure there may be way too many recons in the game but if you don’t play hardcore, recons are so incredibly easy to take out most of the time.

@Maps: Zoo is the only one that looks semi-interesting, otherwise not worth $15 to me. The first maps were a disappointment.

Read full topic
item.source: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:10, topic:392993”]There is barely anymore bounce aka ‘sway’, and I’ve tested the new sniping with The Soul (Conor). The shots ended up being on me exactly and him every time.

Yes, I have Xbox.[/quote]… gamertag?

Read full topic

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:8, topic:392993”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=490161.msg3584199#msg3584199 date=1304036418]

The new patch for snipers was an amazing update, this made quick-scoping basically like Modern Warefare two, no doubt.
[/quote]nooo…

Yes actually, the update to the snipers was about sometime this morning at 1:00 AM (EST). And the snipers seem to be much better than they were last time.[/quote]i’ll only be satisfied when there is absolutely no bounce.

but i’m going to go give it a try right now

do you play xbox? we can 1v1 quick scope to test

Read full topic

item.title: Another new thread about new Black Ops maps
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

People have to admit, the things that Treyach come up with as far as the maps are quite amazing. And I do believe the new zombie map is going to be amazing as well, it might get as boring as quickly as Acension did.

The new patch for snipers was an amazing update, this made quick-scoping basically like Modern Warefare two, no doubt.

Read full topic
